definition: a haze of doubts and suspicions
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: A cloud of suspicion still hung over the White House.
sentences.chinese: 白宮上空仍籠罩着一團疑雲。

sentences.english: Zeng Lvchuan homosexuality misgivings ' he also vigorously denied.
sentences.chinese: 曾屢傳同性戀疑雲的他也極力否認。

sentences.english: I've only ever done it the one time with The Bourne Supremacy.
sentences.chinese: 我只有在拍神鬼疑雲的時候做過一次。

sentences.english: I finished watching Changeling this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我今天晚上看完了電影《換子疑雲》。

sentences.english: Melt the clouds of sin and sadness.
There was a mystery surrounding this black bearded, handsome man.
sentences.chinese: 這個蓄着黑鬚的英俊男人的周圍縈繞着一團疑雲。

sentences.english: The president's insensitive comments caused a lot of eyebrows to be raised.
sentences.chinese: 總統愚魯的言論造成一大堆疑雲升起。

sentences.english: I watched half of the movie Changeling this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我看了電影《換子疑雲》一半的內容。

sentences.english: Despite the continuing suspicions of radiation, the staff continued repair work.
sentences.chinese: 儘管輻射疑雲持續，工作人員還是繼續搶修工作。

sentences.english: The silver itne in the clouds of doubt.
sentences.chinese: 成功是疑雲中透明出一線銀光。

sentences.english: Speculation had centered on whether an independent energy ministry would be established.
sentences.chinese: 疑雲的中心在於能否成立一個獨立的能源部。

sentences.english: The force of her faith in Lily must have helped to dispel his hesitations .
sentences.chinese: 自己對麗莉的信任一定幫助過他驅散心中的疑雲。

definition: could happen at any moment/on the verge
to vanish without trace (idiom)/to lie low
hissing sound/to hiss (as a sign of displeasure)
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
to vanish/to disappear from the face of the earth
